Package dev.simplix.cirrus.common.business

Interface MenuItemWrapper

All Known Implementing Classes:
DataInventoryMenuItemWrapper, InventoryMenuItemWrapper, ProtocolizeMenuItemWrapper
public interface MenuItemWrapper
An MenuItemWrapper provides uniform data access for items across different platforms. Please be aware, that most of the given properties are immutable, so you have to set them using their setter after you have done some changes.

    • nbt

      net.querz.nbt.tag.CompoundTag nbt()
      This returns a querz-nbt CompoundTag with the nbt information about this item. Please be aware, that the nbt data of spigot ItemStacks are immutable. So you have to call setNBT() after you changed the data to set them.
